entry.title: Making Sorbet more incremental
entry.summary: ← Return home My main focus last year was improving the Sorbet editor experience: making Sorbet feel snappier while powering language-aware editor features. The biggest improvements came from making Sorbet more incremental. By being smarter about skipping redundant work, we slashed the time it takes for Sorbet to do things like update the list of errors, populate autocompletion suggestions, and jump between definitions and usages.
